description: Adds a new schema to your GraphQL API. This operation is asynchronous. Use to determine when it has completed.

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: The schema definition, in GraphQL schema language format.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of the schema (PROCESSING, FAILED, SUCCESS, or NOT_APPLICABLE). When the schema is in the ACTIVE state, you can add data.
